      • willCheck

        public boolean willCheck(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         CheckType type)
        Find out if a check will occur for a player. This checks if they are being tracked, the check is active, the player isn't exempt from the check, and the player doesn't have override permission.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to check
        type - Type to check
        Returns:
        true if plugin will check this player, and that all things allow it to happen.
